name: JCommunique
body: #JCommunique JCommunique is a free, open-source desktop notification library. It offers a range of features with a simple to use API. Here are some clips of JCommunique in action (taken directly from the demos): ###SimpleManager ###QueueManager See the github wiki page for more information: https://github.com/spfrommer/JCommunique/wiki
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
